DOC.brief_title: Endometrial Injury Versus Luteal Phase Support Intrauterine Insemination Cycles
DOC.detailed_description: Group 1 : Endometrial biopsy perform day 21-24 spontaneous menstrual cycle proceed intrauterine insemination ( IUI ) treatment cycle . Two small biopsy obtain anterior posterior wall uterus . Group 2 : Vaginal progesterone gel administer luteal phase support second day insemination pregnancy test continue presence pregnancy 12 week pregnancy . Goup 3 : Patients undergone intrauterine insemination ( IUI ) cycle stimulate gonadotropin without intervention . The effect endometrial injury luteal phase progesterone support pregnancy rate patient intrauterine insemination ( IUI ) cycle stimulate gonadotropin compare term biochemical pregnancy rate , clinical pregnancy rate ongoing pregnancy rate .
DOC.criteria: Patients undergone intrauterine insemination gonadotropin stimulation Bilateral patent fallopian tube reveal hysterosalpingography laparoscopy After semen preparation intrauterine insemination , total progressive sperm count > 5 million endocrin metabolic disorder , uterine factor , pelvic inflammatory disease , woman basal folliclestimulating hormone ( FSH ) level > 15 IU/mL , body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 35 kg/m2 , age ≥ 40 < 18 year ,
